code: import axiosClient from'./axiosClient';const MessengerAPI={getMessage:query=>{const url=`/messenger/${query}`;return axiosClient.get(url);},postMessage:query=>{const url=`/messenger/send${query}`;return axiosClient.post(url);},postConversation:query=>{const url=`/messenger/conversation${query}`;return axiosClient.post(url);}};export default MessengerAPI;
